TopicTitle: Special asteroids from the great beyond

Articles.Content: It would be interesting to autogenerate anomalies asteroids on escape trajectories from Kerbin, anomalies non-gravitational acceleration, and odd surfaces. Among other difficult to explain properties. Possibly even a variety of interstellar asteroids.

And not only asteroids. Any random unusual objects to be studied on their fly-by.

Mini black holes, derelict ships, ...

Edited July 1, 2019 by kerbiloid
